block.p: PARKERVISION INC., Jacksonville, Fla., a wireless technology company, said it had received $30 million in investments from Tyco International Ltd. and Leucadia National Corp.

NEWELL RUBBERMAID INC., Freeport, Ill., maker of Rubbermaid containers and Rolodex office products, agreed to buy the French picture-frame maker Brio, owned by closely held Larson-Juhl International L.L.C., for an undisclosed price.
PARKERVISION INC., Jacksonville, Fla., a wireless technology company, said it had received $30 million in investments from Tyco International Ltd. and Leucadia National Corp.

NEWELL RUBBERMAID INC., Freeport, Ill., maker of Rubbermaid containers and Rolodex office products, agreed to buy the French picture-frame maker Brio, owned by closely held Larson-Juhl International L.L.C., for an undisclosed price.
NCR CORP., Dayton, Ohio., the No. 1 maker of automated teller machines, said it won orders for 750 A.T.M.'s from private banks and financial institutions in India. Financial terms were not disclosed.

SEACOR SMIT INC., Houston, which provides marine transportation for offshore drilling as well as environmental services for oil and gas drillers, said it would split its stock three shares for two on June 15 for shareholders on record on June 2.
